name: The Devourer
description: Consumes all in its path. Endless Hunger.

name: The Veiled
description: Shrouded in secrecy, hidden from all. Keeper of Shadows.

name: The Harbinger
description: Bringer of doom and calamity. Omen of Destruction.

name: The Relentless
description: Never stops, never rests. Unending Chase.

name: The Abyss
description: Stares into the void and consumes all light. Endless Darkness.

name: The Whisperer
description: Keeper of forbidden secrets and dark truths. Bearer of Whispers.

name: The Desolate
description: Embodies despair and isolation. Emptiness Unbound.

name: The Serpent
description: Slithers unseen, striking swiftly. Fang of the Shadows.

name: The Shattered
description: Lives in fragments and broken pieces. Reflections of the Lost.

name: The Forsaken
description: Abandoned by the gods and left to wander. Outcast of the Divine.

name: The Martyr
description: Endures all pain for the greater good. Bearer of Suffering.

name: The Corrupter
description: Twists purity into darkness. Spreader of Taint.

name: The Tempest
description: Unleashes storms and chaos. Bringer of the Storm.

name: The Eternal
description: Exists beyond the grasp of time. Keeper of Eternity.

name: The Wanderer
description: Journeys endlessly under the stars. Eternal Traveler.

name: The Deceiver
description: Masters of lies and illusion. Weavers of Falsehoods.

name: The Purifier
description: Burns away all that is impure. Flame of Purity.

name: The Trickster
description: Sows chaos and revels in mischief. Harbinger of Tricks.

name: The Forsworn
description: Betrays all vows and promises. Oathbreaker.

name: The Revenant
description: Returns from the grave to seek vengeance. Unyielding Spirit.

name: The Enigma
description: Embodies mystery and the unknown. Bearer of Secrets.

name: The Judge
description: Delivers divine justice. Arbiter of Truth.

name: The Void
description: Embraces the infinite emptiness. Herald of the Abyss.

name: The Pilgrim
description: Embodies a journey of faith and perseverance. Walker of Sacred Paths.

name: The Weaver
description: Embodies fate and interconnectedness through craftsmanship. Spinner of Destinies.

name: The Forgotten
description: Preserves lost knowledge and histories. Guardian of Forgotten Lore.

name: The Fury
description: Channels uncontrollable rage and power. Bearer of Wrath.

name: The Eclipse
description: Embodies balance between light and dark. Harbinger of Duality.

name: The Obsidian
description: Embodies resilience and hidden power. Bearer of Endurance.

name: The Whisperer
description: Embody secrets and subtle influence. Keeper of Whispers.

name: The Thorned
description: Embodies beauty and pain intertwined. Bearer of Thorns.

name: The Cryptkeeper
description: Guardianship over the dead and their secrets. Keeper of the Silent.

name: The Sentinel
description: Eternal protector and watchful eye. Unyielding Guardian.

name: The Faceless
description: Shifts identities and masks their true self. Bearer of Many Faces.

name: The Shattered
description: Embraces fractured reality and inner turmoil. Keeper of Broken Minds.

name: The Voidwalker
description: Embodies journeys into the unknown void. Explorer of the Abyss.

name: The Gravedigger
description: Embodies the cycle of life and death. Keeper of the Resting.
